mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate= NOW(), title =#{title}, `body`= #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId};
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, m.nickname AS 'extra__writer', b.name AS board_name FROM article a INNER JOIN `member` m ON a.memberId = m.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id WHERE 1
AND a.boardId = #{boardId}
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
ORDER BY a.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{limitTake}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article a WHERE 1
AND a.boardId = #{boardId}
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))

SELECT a.*, m.name AS 'extra__writer', b.name AS 'board_name', IFNULL(SUM(R.`point`), 0) AS 'extra__sumReactionPoint', IFNULL(SUM(IF(R.`point` > 0, R.`point`, 0)),0) AS 'goodReactionPoint', IFNULL(SUM(IF(R.`point` < 0, R.`point`, 0)),0) AS 'badReactionPoint' FROM article a INNER JOIN `member` m ON a.memberId = m.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS R ON a.id = R.relId AND R.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE a.id = #{id} GROUP BY a.id
